problem.markdown:
1. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
( ) Undamped ( ) Overdamped (x) Damped ( ) Underdamped
2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?
( ) The force causing the initial displacement is removed ( ) It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it (x) It vibrates freely with no force acting on it ( ) It vibrates in free space
3. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to
( ) Friction at support ( ) Hysteresis damping ( ) None of the above (x) Friction at support and Hysteresis damping
4. The moment of inertia of the beam cross-section and for a circular cross-section it is given as,?
( ) I=pi/32d4 ( ) I=pi/62d4 (x) I=pi/64d4 ( ) I=pi/34d4
5. For a Fixed-Fixed beam with a point load at the middle, The stiffness is
( ) EI/L3 (x) 192EI/L3 ( ) 48EI/L3 ( ) 3EI/L3
problem.p: 1. If energy is lost in any way during vibration, the system can be considered to be ?
2. A body is said to undergo free vibration, when?

choicegroup.choice: The force causing the initial displacement is removed
It vibrates freely with no resistive force acting on it
It vibrates freely with no force acting on it

problem.p: 3. In free vibration experiment the damping may occur due to

choicegroup.choice: Friction at support and Hysteresis damping

problem.p: 4. The moment of inertia of the beam cross-section and for a circular cross-section it is given as,?
